橓字的基本解释

橓
shùn
古同“蕣”。

橓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shùn］
［《集韻》輸閏切，去稕，書。］
同“蕣1”。
即木槿。参见“橓華”。

橓字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　橓； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页553第16
【集韻】舒閏切，音舜。卽木菫，朝榮暮落者。【詩·鄭風】顏如舜華。或作橓。詳槿字註。亦作蕣、舜。

橓字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
橓字的起名意思

暂无。

shùn

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shùn］
["Ji Yun" lose run-cut, go to jade, book. ]
Same as "Chain 1".
Namely hibiscus. See "Luohua".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　橓; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 553-16
[Ji Yun] Shu Run cut, Yin Shun.卽木諫, those who fall in the morning and evening. [Poetry·Zheng Feng] Yan Rushunhua. Or make it. Detailed hibiscus note. Also known as Fetters and Shun.
